entry.title: that something lovers call fate
entry.summary:
Author: theramblingwriter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 62,206Chapters: 13/16Kudos: 46

Summary: Buck and Eddie first meet in 2016 when Eddie needs a partner to drive with him and his son from El Paso to LA where he's moving to be with his girlfriend and start a new life with the LAFD.He doesn't think he and Buck are destined to be friends. They probably won't think about each other again.Two years later Buck and Eddie run into each other when Eddie is at a cafe with his wife.Buck wonders if this is the universe giving them a second chance to get to know each other. Neither of them take it.Three more years pass by before they meet again.Eddie transfers to the 118 after his divorce, and Buck's still mourning an unexpected breakup with his girlfriend… but this time, things just seem to click.

entry.title: crawling back to you
entry.summary:
Author: oceanofchaos

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,476Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 6

Summary: “Eddie, I’m in love with you,” he says, heart thrumming in his chest, in his throat, in his mouth. He feels hot and cold and dizzy by turns. “What?” asks Eddie faintly, barely even a question. “I’m in love with you,” Buck says again. “I didn’t know, I didn’t mean to, but I am. I am.” “You– Right, okay,” says Eddie, so visibly buffering that it makes Buck’s heart clench a little in his chest. Of course he’s in love with Eddie. How could he possibly have let himself pretend otherwise. “Wasn’t expecting this, bud,” says Eddie, and he sounds so shocked that Buck can’t help a wry smile. Of course Eddie’s surprised. They must be the only two people in existence who didn’t already know. “I– Buck, man, you know that I care about you, but…” “I know,” he says gently to Eddie, because he did know, but that doesn't make this moment hurt any less.  ---Post season 8, Buck confesses his feelings, Eddie lets him down as gently as he can, and they both try to figure out how to be just friends.

entry.title: The Ground Beneath Us
entry.summary:
Author: Liaminator18

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,189Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 0

Summary: “I’ve decided the theme is ‘Starlight and Stability.’” Christopher declared from the living room, voice full of purpose.Carla blinked at him over the rim of her tea. “That sounds… very grown up.”“It’s supposed to represent them,” Chris said simply, gesturing toward Eddie. “Because stars are about dreams and forever. And stability is about… home.”Eddie nearly dropped his mug.Starlight and stability.Dreams and home.-OR-Buck and Eddie are planning their wedding in the quiet aftermath of Eddie's space mission, trying to find their new normal.

entry.title: best friends, ex-friends 'til the end (better off as lovers)
entry.summary:
Author: drakesword

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,110Chapters: 16/40Kudos: 36

Summary: A lot of things are gay at this school, Eddie has noticed. It’s not necessarily a new phenomenon, but back in elementary school, that word was only ever hushed, giggled over, never dared to be said in front of the teachers, in fear of being scolded.Here, however, it’s shouted down hallways, said out loud in classrooms, written on blackboards, thrown at the heads of kids who dare to express themselves in the wrong way.So yeah, no thanks. Eddie would rather not approach, or even look at anyone with something remotely close to a social life at this school again. He doesn’t want to make himself a target.Because if there is one thing people should know about him, it’s this: Eddie Diaz is not gay. Or; AU where Buck and Eddie meet in middle school and quickly become best friends. But as they grow up alongside each other, their dynamic evolves more and more into something Eddie is not quite ready to face.

entry.title: Buck's Big New Adventure.
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,506Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 27

Summary: In a slight AU of the 9-1-1 world; where the rich have Slaves, our favorite firefighter Eddie is desperate enough to do the unthinkable. He's still the same broke firefighter, but now in a city that runs on image and influence, he needs a loan, badly to keep a roof over Chris's head, and there's only one way in: a private party for the powerful, where slaves are the latest status symbol.So for just one night, Eddie will ask his best friend, Evan 'Buck' Buckley to do the unthinkable and become a Slave. It's just for one night, just for show.Eddie will get the loan and tomorrow Buck will go back to being Buck. Right?

entry.title: his sweet puppy.
entry.summary:
Author: kryptonian

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,676Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 19

Summary: “Do you need it?” Eddie asks, nodding toward the drawer where they both know the collar is kept.Buck wants to say no. He should say no.He’s messed up—again. All day, he’s been off, short-tempered, careless. He knows he’s pissed Eddie off. And he knows that even if Eddie punishes him for it, the aftercare will be soft, gentle, undeserved.He doesn’t deserve that kind of sweetness.He barely notices Eddie moving until he’s right in front of him.“Buck. Hey. I got you. Do you need it or not?” Eddie catches Buck’s chin between his index finger and thumb, tilting him down to look at him. His voice is steady and so easy to latch onto. He’s looking at Buck. He’s paying attention to him, even after everything. Buck hasn’t earned it.Buck has to earn love. Or he thought that, but right now, he’s not doing a lot of thinking. The second he nods, Eddie is smiling so softly at him, lifting a hand to pet through Buck’s hair.tl;dr: sub top puppy buck is the best boy !!

entry.title: Phoenix from the ashes
entry.summary:
Author: Ficalicious

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,587Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 291

Summary: All in all, Buck was feeling great about his return to the 118.He had earned his life back.Spencer had been right, the decision to take his leg had been the right one in the end he knew, he had no regrets. And the team had welcomed him back, Bobby especially despite the fact that during the first few shifts the man had looked more than a little tense, his eyes constantly straying back to Buck as if he was terrified something would go wrong and he’d get hurt again....Buck is back where he belongs. Featuring surprise visitors, and LA having a new serial killer calling himself the Phoenix.

entry.title: The Quiet Between Them
entry.summary:
Author: WhereFirefliesLand

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,095Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 311

Summary: Buck's used to being loud and taking up space. But lately, it feels like everyone else is talking without him. Tommy's too busy with his newfound popularity. Eddie's laughing more and spending more time with Tommy. And Buck–Buck's still trying to catch up to a conversation that keeps moving without him. There's something growing in the quiet between them. He just doesn't know what it means yet.

entry.title: And somehow, I found my way back to you
entry.summary:
Author: mostly_luminous

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,007Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 4

Summary: Evan Buckley hides his pain to avoid burdening others, always putting their needs first. Seen as strong and dependable, he silently struggles while earning praise for having it all together. But no one realizes the emotional cost of being the one everyone relies on—because he never shows how broken he really feels inside.And then, he just wants to stop. Maybe start something new. Somewhere far.So, he left... the 118, his sister, LA.... Eddie.And after 2 years, he still found his way to them........to him.

entry.title: I Didn’t Mean to Be Something I’m Not Supposed To, but I Am. I Am.
entry.summary:
Author: schrijverr

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,761Chapters: 2/23Kudos: 112

Summary: After everything Buck and Eddie have gone through together, the marriage that was once just convenience is now real. They’re boyfriend-husbands, trying to figure out what their life looks like now that they’re dating and learning to be an actual couple.However, trouble arises with the promised trip back home to El Paso for the summer. Eddie is not ready to come out to his parents and Buck supports him in that. Still, El Paso is not the place where either of them have been their best and tensions arise between them when having to exist in the influence sphere of the Diaz parents. Everything that has happened between them catches up as personal histories, insecurities and unresolved issues float back up to the surface.AKA: The terrible, horrible, no good, very bad El Paso trip.

entry.title: Tangled Between Grief and Love

Author: the_writers_block15

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,606Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 34

Summary: While Eddie’s on shift, Buck takes Christopher out to celebrate what would’ve been Shannon’s 33rd birthday. Along the way, new truths about grief and love begin to surface as Buck helps Christopher navigate the weight of missing and losing his mother. Meanwhile, Eddie has a reckoning of his own when the day’s events come to light.Content note: The first part of this story deals closely with grief. If you’re not in a place to read that right now, please take care of yourself and skip this one — no hard feelings.

entry.title: All the Signs I Missed
entry.summary:
Author: IdoGeek

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 734Chapters: 1/12Kudos: 20

Summary: It’s not a whisper, not exactly. It’s just… matter-of-fact. Like saying it out loud isn’t the hard part. Like waiting for a reaction is.The words drop between them, sudden and small, but precise.Eddie blinks, caught mid-step.“What?”Buck searches his face. Something subtle shifts behind his eyes. “Wait… you didn’t know?”There’s no accusation in it. Just confusion. Like it never occurred to him that Eddie wouldn’t know.Eddie stares, his brain a beat behind his body. “No, I—I didn’t.” OR Buck is trans and out. So out, that most people don't think about it anymore. So when Eddie joins the 118, no one mentions it. So, how long will it be, until Eddie finds out? finished and will be updated daily
